MailBean - Class in com.apgar.common.lib.mail
Represents a mail configuration bean that retrieves SMTP settings from environment variables or ebx.properties file.
MailBean() - Constructor for class com.apgar.common.lib.mail.MailBean
Constructs a new MailBean instance.
MailService - Class in com.apgar.common.lib.mail
Provides functionality to send emails using SMTP configuration defined in the environment variables or in the EBX properties file.
MailSpecif - Class in com.apgar.common.lib.mail
Represents a mail specification for sending emails.
MailSpecif(String, String, Role, Repository) - Constructor for class com.apgar.common.lib.mail.MailSpecif
Constructs a MailSpecif instance with a subject, a body, and recipients belonging to a specific role (toRole).
MailSpecif(String, String, UserReference, Repository) - Constructor for class com.apgar.common.lib.mail.MailSpecif
Constructs a MailSpecif instance for a specific user as the recipient, along with a specific subject and content.
MailSpecif(String, String, String) - Constructor for class com.apgar.common.lib.mail.MailSpecif
Constructs a MailSpecif with the specified subject, content, and recipients.
MailSpecif(String, String, String, String) - Constructor for class com.apgar.common.lib.mail.MailSpecif
Constructs a MailSpecif with the specified subject, content, recipients, and bcc recipients.

Constructs a MailSpecif with the specified subject, content, sender, recipients, and bcc recipients.
MailSpecif(String, String, String, String, Set<String>) - Constructor for class com.apgar.common.lib.mail.MailSpecif
Constructs a MailSpecif instance with the specified subject, content, sender, recipients, and bcc recipients.
MailSpecif(String, String, String, String, Set<String>, String) - Constructor for class com.apgar.common.lib.mail.MailSpecif
Constructs a MailSpecif instance with the specified subject, content, sender, recipients, cc recipients, and bcc recipients.

MandatoryOnOtherFieldValueConstraint - Class in com.apgar.common.lib.constraint
Constraint that sets mandatory the field it is defined on if the parameter mandatoringField field has the same value as the parameter mandatoringValue.

MandatoryOnOtherFieldValueOtherwiseEmptyConstraint - Class in com.apgar.common.lib.constraint
Constraint that sets mandatory the field it is defined on if the parameter mandatoringField has the same value as the mandatoringValue parameter, otherwise it should be empty.
MandatoryOnOtherFieldValueOtherwiseEmptyConstraint() - Constructor for class com.apgar.common.lib.constraint.MandatoryOnOtherFieldValueOtherwiseEmptyConstraint
